newsitem.title: USA: Green Oasis hires independent counsel.
newsitem.headline: Green Oasis hires independent counsel.

text.p: Green Oasis Environmental Inc said a temporary suspension of over-the-counter trading of its securities expired Thursday and that it has hired independent outside counsel to investigate concerns raised by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
The suspension expired at 2359 EDT, it said.
Green Oasis said in a statement that pending completion of outside counsel's investigation, it will not comment on the accuracy or adequacy of previously disseminated information.
Green Oasis manufactures equipment that produces diesel and heating fuels from waste motor oil.
The SEC earlier this month suspended trading in Green Oasis, saying that questions "have been raised about the accuracy and adequacy of publicly disseminated information."
Green Oasis has said it believes heavy traffic on the Internet about the company may have prompted the SEC's decision to suspend trading.
